metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15914 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect implementation of access controls allows remote users to override repository restrictions in Borg servers 1.1.x before 1.1.3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15914` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

borgbackup - 1.0.11-0ubuntu1.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: borgbackup package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.11-0ubuntu1.16.04.2').
